entries.s_f42e101f:
I've got races to win and chumps to scam.  Answer the question or get out of my face.

What do you want?
entries.s_d38d76e0: This does not have to get violent.
entries.s_cec4328: Forty million credits and a penthouse apartment in Coruscant?
entries.s_ce804243: What? Looking for a fight? Not today, chump, but definitely some other time.
entries.s_cdc241bf: Well then it doesn't look like you are going to be returning to your good friend with this here ring.  Unless...
entries.s_860ae378:
Actually, I've given Keicho enough options.  

Either you fight me for this here ring, or you go back to him empty handed.
entries.s_8514b7c5: I am not willing to solve this with blood shed.  Good bye.
entries.s_83f28a20: Maybe, what is in it for me?
entries.s_80764fc6: Yeah, and I don't plan on giving it up.  So unless you are willing test your luck and pry it off my cold dead hands I recommend you go back to Keicho and tell him to find some other chump to do his dirty work.
entries.s_711691ff: I'm looking for a wedding ring, have you seen one?
entries.s_4f77458a:
Ha... right. That's funny.

You mean this ring? The one I took from Keicho? The one he balked on when it came time to place a bet. I won his landspeeder last week, and his wifes wedding gown the week before that.

I love that gown. But he wouldn't bet the ring. Couldn't understand why, so I just took it.
entries.s_443c85ef: Forty million credits and a penthouse apartment in Coruscant.
entries.s_36ab201c: If you insist on a fight, I won't back down.
entries.s_157b6369: Believe me friend, I have far more than luck on my side.
